ğŸ“Š Profile Card Shows:

  • âœ… Profile picture with verification badge
  • âœ… Username and platform name
  • âœ… Bio/description
  • âœ… Total posts count
  • âœ… Total followers

What Gets Displayed

ğŸ“‹ Profile Information

Left Side:

  • Profile Picture (32x32 or larger)
  • Username/Handle
  • Platform name
  • Verification badge

Right Side:

  • Bio/Description
  • Total Posts count
  • Followers count
  • Engagement rate

ğŸ“¸ Post Information

Post Content:

  • Post type badge (Image/Video/Text)
  • Post status (Published/Scheduled)
  • Image/Video preview
  • Caption or text content

Post Stats:

  • Hashtags (first 3 shown)
  • Likes count
  • Comments count
  • Shares count
  • Post date

How to Add Data in Sanity

Step 1: Create Social Profile

Go to Sanity Studio â†’ Social Media Profile

Fill in:

  • Platform (dropdown)
  • Username
  • Profile URL
  • Profile Picture (upload)
  • Bio
  • Followers count
  • Posts count
  • Engagement rate (%)
  • Verification badge (toggle)

Step 2: Create Posts

Go to Sanity Studio â†’ Social Media Posts

Fill in:

  • Select platform (reference to Social Profile)
  • Post type (Text/Image/Video/Link/Story)
  • Caption
  • Hashtags (array)
  • Status (Published/Scheduled/Draft)
  • Optional: Image, Video URL, Link URL

Step 3: See Results

Once you save, the data automatically appears on this page. Profile card shows all details, and all posts display in a grid.
